page.title: 07A FAMILY WEEKEND IN BARCOMBE
page.content: {A report by Andrew Potter.} {Saturday:}The family rose by 8.45am and started breakfast.I had cereal and orange juice,while my sister,Jo,had crackers,jam and orange juice.By 10A.M Dad,Jo and I were ready to go shopping in Lewes for various items.Meanwhile Mum went to help with the coffee morning in aid of the Red Cross.When we returned from Lewes,Jo went to the coffee morning while Dad mowed the lawn and I watched a television programme.At 1.00pm we had lunch consisting of baked potatoes,hot rolls cheese and pickles.Afterwards Dad and I went to Seaford for a walk by the sea and visited a museum which is in a Napoleonic martello tower.Jo had gone bellringing while Mum did jobs around the house.When Dad and I returned from Seaford I played outside until tea, which for me consisted of a roll,spam
